text: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ

translation.en: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal, [O Muhammad], to you. And you were not with them when they put together their plan while they conspired
translation.id: Itulah sebagian berita gaib yang Kami wahyukan kepadamu (Muhammad); padahal engkau tidak berada di samping mereka, ketika mereka bersepakat mengatur tipu muslihat (untuk memasukan Yusuf ke dalam sumur)
